description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget 'SearchScreen' allowing users to search for books within a library or store. It includes UI components and logic for searching, displaying results instantly, and navigating to detailed book views.

classes.name: SearchScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget providing a search interface for books.

classes.name: _SearchScreenState
classes.description: State class implementing search logic and UI for SearchScreen.

methods.name: _runSearch
methods.description: Executes the search query by invoking the BookService and updates the results list.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TextEditingController when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _openBookDetailsScreen
methods.description: Navigates to the BookDetailsScreen for the selected book, then refreshes results after returning.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI with search input and results list.
